attributes.action: when someone sells a house and puts it on market the seller can't change its mind.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i wanted a house i put an offer in it all the paperwork was done the legal documents, mortgage, load etc etc and when the seller had to sign the house over in my name changed his mind and it left me devastated please sign if this is ever happend to you pleasee i lost 10 grand .
